extension.name: Simple Registration
extension.author: GiBiLogic
extension.description:
GiBi Simpleregistration

A Joomla extension by GiBiLogic

This module allows user to register by inserting only an e-mail address: it will be used both as "Full name" and "Username"; password will be created randomly and sent to the user.

Discover other extension by GiBiLogic at extensions.gibilogic.com
